message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on a product that I know you'll find valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $14,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,500?
